00040 #ifndef CONVERSIONS_H
00041 #define CONVERSIONS_H
00042 
00043 #include <nav_msgs/Odometry.h>
00044 #include <nav_msgs/Path.h>
00045 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/FrameWithId.h"
00046 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/TwistWithId.h"
00047 
00048 namespace conversions {
00049 
00050     inline void odometryRosToFrame(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odometry, FrameWithId& pose) {
00051         const geometry_msgs::Quaternion& orientation = odometry.pose.pose.orientation;
00052         const geometry_msgs::Point& position = odometry.pose.pose.position;
00053         pose.id = odometry.header.frame_id;
00054         pose.M = KDL::Rotation::Quaternion(orientation.x, orientation.y, orientation.z, orientation.w);
00055         pose.p = KDL::Vector(position.x, position.y, position.z);
00056     }
00057 
00058     inline void odometryRosToTwist(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odometry, TwistWithId& twist) {
00059         const geometry_msgs::Vector3& angular = odometry.twist.twist.angular;
00060         const geometry_msgs::Vector3& linear = odometry.twist.twist.linear;
00061         twist.id = odometry.header.frame_id;
00062         twist.rot = KDL::Vector(angular.x, angular.y, angular.z);
00063         twist.vel = KDL::Vector(linear.x, linear.y, linear.z);
00064     }
00065 
00066     inline void poseRosToFrame(const geometry_msgs::Pose& poseRos, const std::string& id, FrameWithId& pose) {
00067         const geometry_msgs::Quaternion& orientation = poseRos.orientation;
00068         const geometry_msgs::Point& position = poseRos.position;
00069         pose.id = id;
00070         pose.M = KDL::Rotation::Quaternion(orientation.x, orientation.y, orientation.z, orientation.w);
00071         pose.p = KDL::Vector(position.x, position.y, position.z);
00072     }
00073 
00074     inline void poseStampedRosToFrame(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& poseStamped, FrameWithId& pose) {
00075         poseRosToFrame(poseStamped.pose, poseStamped.header.frame_id, pose);
00076     }
00077 
00078     inline void frameToPoseRos(const FrameWithId& pose, geometry_msgs::Pose& poseRos, std::string& id) {
00079         id = pose.id;
00080         pose.M.GetQuaternion(poseRos.orientation.x,
00081                 poseRos.orientation.y,
00082                 poseRos.orientation.z,
00083                 poseRos.orientation.w);
00084         poseRos.position.x = pose.p.x();
00085         poseRos.position.y = pose.p.y();
00086         poseRos.position.z = pose.p.z();
00087     }
00088 
00089     inline void frameToPoseStampedRos(const FrameWithId& pose, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& poseStamped) {
00090         frameToPoseRos(pose, poseStamped.pose, poseStamped.header.frame_id);
00091     }
00092 
00093     inline void pathToPathRos(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, std::vector <geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& pathRos) {
00094         if (!path.empty()) {
00095             std::vector<FrameWithId>::const_iterator it = path.begin();
00096             geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
00097             while (it != path.end()) {
00098                 frameToPoseStampedRos(*it, pose);
00099                 pathRos.push_back(pose);
00100                 ++it;
00101             }
00102         }
00103     }
00104 
00105     inline void pathToPathRos(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, nav_msgs::Path& pathRos) {
00106         if (!path.empty()) {
00107             std::vector<FrameWithId>::const_iterator it = path.begin();
00108             pathRos.header.frame_id = it->id;
00109             pathToPathRos(path, pathRos.poses);
00110         }
00111     }
00112 
00113     inline void pathRosToPath(const std::vector <geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& pathRos, std::vector<FrameWithId>& path) {
00114         if (!pathRos.empty()) {
00115             std::vector <geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>::const_iterator it = pathRos.begin();
00116             FrameWithId pose;
00117             while (it != pathRos.end()) {
00118                 poseStampedRosToFrame(*it, pose);
00119                 path.push_back(pose);
00120                 ++it;
00121             }
00122         }
00123     }
00124 
00125     inline void pathRosToPath(const nav_msgs::Path& pathRos, std::vector<FrameWithId>& path) {
00126         pathRosToPath(pathRos.poses, path);
00127     }
00128 
00129 }
00130 #endif  /* CONVERSIONS_H */
